category-def.name: commonclipse for eclipse 3.7 (indigo) SR2
category-def.label: Commonclipse for eclipse 3.7 (indigo) SR2
category-def.description: Commonclipse is an eclipse plugin for jakarta commons-lang users. It features automatic generation of the following methods using commons-lang builders: toString(), hashcode(), equals(Object), compareTo(Object).
